title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.

title: Matlock Duo Sing Us a Li’l Something, Rave That ‘Everyone’ Now Wants to Appear on the CBS Hit — WATCH
description: Matlock co-stars Skye P. Marshall and Jason Ritter make a bit of beautiful music together at the top of the TVLine red carpet video above. After harmonizing a few bars and then amazingly speaking in totally perfect unison, the on-screen exes got to revisiting some of the freshman CBS hit’s biggest twists. When Olympia in […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: The Bear Throws a Wild Wedding — and an Oscar-Winning Star Is Invited
description: Warning: This post contains spoilers for Season 4, Episode 7 of The Bear. Richie’s ex-wife Tiff is getting married on The Bear, and you know what that means: It’s time for another chaotic Berzatto family reunion! (And another top-secret cameo from a big star.) Season 4’s seventh episode is a supersized one, clocking in at […]
author: Dave Nemetz
